sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
leaning or pressing against something else
se na tisto naslanja ali pritiska.

seg.quote: She was pressing her nose against the window.

sense.def:
To compete against someone in a game
pomeni poskušati v igri nekoga premagati.

seg.quote: He played in the first Test Match against Australia.

sense.def:
To do something against someone or something
pomeni storiti nekaj, kar tistemu lahko škoduje.

seg.quote: They were not allowed to use arms against their enemies.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
against an idea, policy, or system
nasprotuje neki zamisli, politiki ali sistemu.

seg.quote: He was fanatically against American intervention in the war.

sense.def:
Kar je
against the law
je z zakonom prepovedano.

To take action against a possible future event
pomeni poskusiti preprečiti možen prihodnji dogodek.

seg.quote: He has taken certain precautions against burglary.

sense.def:
To be moving against a current, tide, or wind
pomeni premikati se v nasprotni smeri kot tok, plima ali veter.

The chances or odds against something happening
so možnosti ali upanje, da se tisto ne bo zgodilo.

seg.quote: The odds against another attack were astronomical.
